tool_description: Extracts and preprocesses audio tracks from video files for content analysis, with options for segmentation and format conversion.

video_path.description: Path to the video file containing audio

output_format.description: Audio output format: wav, mp3, or flac

segment_duration.description: Duration of audio segments in seconds (0 for no segmentation)

error_messages: No audio track found: The video file does not contain an audio track.
Audio extraction failed: Could not extract audio from the video file.
Invalid output format: Use one of [wav, mp3, flac].
Invalid sample rate: Sample rate must be a positive integer.
Invalid segment duration: segment_duration must be greater than 0 or equal to 0 for no segmentation.
usage: Provide video_path to extract audio. Configure output_format, sample_rate, and segment_duration as needed for downstream analysis.

audio_file_paths.description: Paths to extracted audio files or segments

total_duration.description: Total duration of extracted audio in seconds

audio_properties.description: Technical properties of the extracted audio
